data.name: Axis Game Factory's AGFPRO - Drone Kombat FPS Multiplayer
data.detailed_description:
Drone Kombat is the latest addition to the Axis Game Factory AGFPRO DLC line-up!


Drone Kombat is a fast action Kombat Sci-fi First Person-Shooter where you create your maps from an array of modular interior and exterior location assets. Gameplay comes together when you pilot your vehicle and take out the enemy Drones!!!

Drone Kombat supports:
  • Single Player
  • Team Co-Op
  • Multi-Player - up to 8 players

Key Features Include:
  • Single Wave-Based Enemy Kombat
  • New AI System - AI nodes are built into the model assets in addition, as you play the game, the users paths are recorded and added to the scene file so the more you play, the smarter the AI enemy becomes
  • Enemy Drones
  • Jump-Jets - allow for short bursts to jump location and avoid enemy fire
  • Over 50 Assets that include Space Station and Space Ship - ALL UNLOCKED to use in Unity3d
  • Object List - Object Selection and Template Feature added to AGFPRO
  • Search Feature - enter an asset name into search for easy to locate assets in the World Editor
  • Dynamically Template Searched Assets to expedite your map making (added to AGFPRO)

Multiple Weapons include Primary and Secondary:
  • Quad lazer cannon
  • Rockets
  • Magnetic mines
  • Shields
  • Bombs
  • Health

An Elaborate HUD System Includes:
  • Rearview Camera
  • Enemy Targeting
  • Stats
  • Team/Co-op
  • Displays Allies & Enemies Positioning as well as Health

data.short_description: Drone Kombat is the latest addition to the Axis Game Factory AGFPRO DLC line-up! Drone Kombat is a fast action Kombat Sci-fi First Person-Shooter where you create your maps from an array of modular interior and exterior location assets. Gameplay comes together when you pilot your vehicle and take out the enemy Drones!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon X2 or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 6600 / ATI Radeon X800 (shader model 2.0+) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: On 64 bit machines the following must be installed - Microsoft Visual C++ Redist (64)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad / AMD Phenom 2 x4 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 470GTX Titan / ATI Radeon 5850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: On 64 bit machines the following must be installed - Microsoft Visual C++ Redist (64)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6 or better
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz PowerPC 970MP or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia / ATI (shader model 2.0+, year 2004)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More is better...
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mountain Lion 10.8 or better
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia / ATI (shader model 4.0+, year 2009) or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More is better

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon x2 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 6600 / ATI Radeon X800 (shader model 2.0+) or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More is better...
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad / AMD Phenom 2 x4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 470GTX / ATI Radeon 5850 or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: More is better
